name: TrickleStar
0:
”Alexa, set Living Room to 72 degrees”
”Alexa, increase Living Room temperature by 4 degrees”
”Alexa, what is the temperature in the Living Room?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Allows you to control your TrickleStar Thermostat and other TrickleStar smart home devices. You use voice commands to turn devices on/off, set temperature, increase and decrease temperature, change mode and resume thermostat schedule. You can also inquire current room temperature.
